objective: Create comprehensive CVA (Commonality Variability Analysis) skill using SkillForge

context.request: User requested complete skill for CVA with matrix-building process, pattern mapping (Strategy/Abstract Factory), integration with architect/decision-critic agents, edge case handling, and validation scripts
constraints: 9/10 timelessness score (based on Coplien 1999, fundamentals from 1970s)
Integration with architect agent, decision-critic, independent-thinker
Tiered depth to prevent analysis paralysis (Quick/Standard/Deep)
Prevents wrong abstractions per CLAUDE.md Design Philosophy

tasksCompleted: Phase 0: Skill Triage - confirmed no existing CVA skill
Phase 1: Deep Analysis - applied 11 thinking lenses, 4 rounds regression questioning
Phase 2: Specification - created complete XML specification (SKILL_SPEC.md)
Phase 3: Generation - created SKILL.md, pattern-mapping-guide.md, matrix-building-examples.md, validate-cva-matrix.py
Phase 4: Synthesis Panel - unanimous 3/3 approval (Design: 9.3, Audience: 9.0, Evolution: 9.3)
decisions: Multi-phase pattern (5 phases) mirrors Coplien's original CVA technique
Abstract Factory primary for .NET examples (payment processing, ASP.NET middleware)
Tiered depth: Quick (15 min), Standard (30 min), Deep (60 min)
4 extension points: pattern mapping, matrix formats, multidimensional analysis, AI integration

nextActions: Test CVA skill with real scenario (payment processing)
Add multidimensional CVA reference doc (extension point)
artifactsCreated: Pattern mapping guide (Strategy, Abstract Factory, Template Method, combinations)
Matrix building examples (.NET: payment processing, ASP.NET middleware, DI lifetimes)
Python validation script with pattern suggestion heuristics
Complete XML specification for future reference
